message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I believe a starting price of $14,500 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $14,500 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is quite a bit below its true value.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Alice, I understand your position but $13,000 is still out of my price range.  I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
